title: Science Job Integrated Learning Design: Activity Theory-Based Simulation Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Educational program for current science professionals, simulating real work environments through VR/simulation. Emphasizes collaboration among learners and role-playing with external experts

learning_goals: Learners can apply Engeström’s activity system model to design work processes for solving scientific job-related problems.
Learners can analyze client requirements in a VR simulation environment and propose science-based solutions.
Learners can perform real scientific research/development scenarios with peers, establishing role distribution and collaboration strategies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
